data.Name: Black Angels
data.Bio: There are several bands known as Black Angels: 1) Black Angels: a Hard-Rock/Heavy-Metal band from Schaffhausen, Switzerland formed in 1979 which is still active today. Releases: * 1981: Hell machine * 1983: Kickdown * 1984: Black Angels (EP) * 1985: Black and White * 1985: Broken Spell 2) Black Angels: Heavy Metal Band from Kongsvinger, Norway which released a two track single and a demo in 1984. In 1986 they released the E.P. On the Run which was produced by former TNT singer Dag Ingebrigtsen. Read more on Last.fm
